content: I want to discuss how and what we want to implement in #5137. Do we only want a setting to enable/disable notifications for alert words?
This topic was moved here from #issues > setting for notification for alert words by Alya Abbott.

We haven't gotten much feedback on alert words in a while, so I don't personally want to prioritize thinking about this issue at the moment and making it actionable. (Others should feel free to discuss, of course.)
